name: Platformer V0.3 Week 5
description:
We are a student team (team4) creating a Platformer for our project around Level Design.

We worked on these features:

Jip: Turret 

Jeroen: Dash 

Hugo: Binary State Switch 

Jordi: Bounce Slash

Controls:

Keyboard: 

Moving: A & D Jump and switch state: Space Dash: Shift Bounce Slash: Arrow Keys

Controller: 

Moving: Left Stick Jump and switch state: A  Dash: Right Trigger Button Bounce Slash: Right Stick

For our project we require play testing. We would appreciate it if you could check out the game and fill in this form below, or click on the feedback button in game:

(link to form)

Thank you!
